summary: This is a news article from Law360 dated December 5, 2018, reporting that Jeffrey Epstein settled a legal dispute with the attorney representing his teenage victims, thereby avoiding a trial where the victims were expected to testify.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Convicted billionaire sex offender who settled a dispute with the attorney representing his teenage victims, avoiding a trial.

events.title: Epstein Settles Victim Lawsuit
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein settled a dispute with the attorney representing his teenage victims, avoiding a trial that was to feature testimony from the women.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein, a convicted billionaire sex offender, settled a legal dispute on December 4, 2018.
The settlement was with the attorney representing his teenage victims.
The settlement avoided a trial where testimony from the victims was expected.
